Scripts.OnLoad:
local icon = self:GetAttribute("icon") local iconAtlas = self:GetAttribute("iconAtlas")
if icon then SetPortraitToTexture(self.Icon, "Interface\\Icons\\"..icon) end
if iconAtlas then self.Icon:SetAtlas(iconAtlas) end
self.Background:SetTexCoord(0.00390625, 0.87890625, 0.59179688, 0.66992188)

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.raceName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.raceName) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.classLocalizedName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.classLocalizedName) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.factionName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.factionName) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Background:SetAtlas("PVPLadder-mystats-background") self.Shadow:SetAtlas("PVPLadder-mystats-shadow") self.Border:SetAtlas("PVPLadder-mystats-light")
self.SetDisabled = function(self, isDisable) self.PlayerNotRank:SetShown(isDisable) self.Background:SetDesaturated(isDisable) self.Border:SetDesaturated(isDisable)
self.RaceIcon:SetShown(not isDisable) self.ClassIcon:SetShown(not isDisable) self.FactionIcon:SetShown(not isDisable)
self.Number:SetShown(not isDisable) self.PlayerName:SetShown(not isDisable) self.Rating:SetShown(not isDisable) end

self.LoadingSpinner.showRetrievingText = true self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetText(STORE_WAIT_SERVER_RESPONSE) self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) self.LoadingSpinner.Dots:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b)

Scripts.OnShow:
local mainFrame = self:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetParent() local cache = mainFrame:GetCache("LADDER_PLAYERS_CACHE_2")
if not cache then self:SetText("") else local searchTextCache = mainFrame:GetCache("SEARCH_TEXT") if searchTextCache then self:SetText(searchTextCache) end end
Scripts.OnTextChanged:
local text = self:GetText() SearchBoxTemplate_OnTextChanged(self)
self.autoCompleteParams = AUTOCOMPLETE_LIST.ALL self.addHighlightedText = true AutoComplete_Update(self, text, self:GetUTF8CursorPosition())
if not self:GetParent().SearchButton.Delay then self:GetParent().SearchButton:SetEnabled(#text >= 2) end

Scripts.OnClick:
self.StartDelay = function() self.Delay = 10 self:Disable() self:SetText(self.Delay)
if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() self.timer = nil end
self.timer = C_Timer:NewTicker(1, function() self.Delay = self.Delay - 1
if self.Delay == 0 then self:Enable() self:SetText(SEARCH) self.Delay = nil else self:SetText(self.Delay) end end, self.Delay) end
local text = self:GetParent().SearchBox:GetText()
if #text >= 2 then local mainFrame = self:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetParent() mainFrame:SetCache("RENEGADE_SEARCH_TEXT", text, true)
AutoComplete_HideIfAttachedTo(self:GetParent().SearchBox) SendServerMessage("ACMSG_PVP_LADDER_GET_SEARCH", string.format("%d:%s", E_LADDER_BRACKET.RENEGADE, text)) end
